purpose: Facilitates the development of generative AI models and applications by providing essential tools and utilities
principle: Builds on popular AI frameworks and libraries to streamline the creation and deployment of generative models
reusability: Modular design with reusable components and APIs for easy integration into various AI projects
limitations: In alpha stage, may lack extensive documentation and community support; features are subject to change
name: omnigenai_toolkit
